LanguageData.Rabbie_Shiporphan.title: Рабби сирота
LanguageData.Rabbie_Shiporphan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была удочерена другой семьей в день когда они начали миграцию в космическое пространство. Проснувшись на новой луне, [PAWN_pronoun] помогала со строительством города, чтобы свести концы с концами. Работа была тяжелой и ее семья не видела ей конца, но [PAWN_pronoun] приспособилась.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Farmkid.title: Рабби ребенок фермер
LanguageData.Rabbie_Farmkid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] выросла помогая [PAWN_possessive] родителям р в теплице на луне под покровом бесконечной пустоты за стеклом. [PAWN_pronoun] не жила в так же богато как некоторые, но [PAWN_possessive] ее научили многому о том, как выращивать растения.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dishwasher.title: Рабби посудомойка
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dishwasher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] зарабатывала на жизнь мытьем посуды в местном ресторане, иногда готовя по простым рецептам. Овощные блюда, приготовленные [PAWN_possessive], не получали хороших отзывов, но ее коллеги их ели.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Childsoldier.title: Рабби ребенок бомбоубежища
LanguageData.Rabbie_Childsoldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была рождена в бомбоубежище на лунной колонии во время Лунной войны. Когда враги осадилии убежища, [PAWN_pronoun] взяла свободное оружие и сражалась.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pickpocket.title: Рабби корманник
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pickpocket.baseDescription: Родившаяся на улицах развивающейся лунной колонии, [PAWN_nameDef] пала до кражи ценностей у других людей в метро чтобы хоть как то выжить. Однажды, [PAWN_pronoun] попыталась забраться в карманы местного уличного бандита и попалась, за что ее [PAWN_possessive] хорошенько избили.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Student.title: Рабби студент
LanguageData.Rabbie_Student.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] посещала общую школу в лунополисе. [PAWN_pronoun] потратила [PAWN_possessive] юность играя в крикет и волнуясь по поводу продолжения учебы.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Hikikomori.title: Рабби хикки
LanguageData.Rabbie_Hikikomori.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] не чувствовала себя комфорто в сообществе Рабби, поэтому [PAWN_pronoun] проводила все [PAWN_possessive] время в затворничестве. [PAWN_possessive] единственной связью с внешним миром был ее компьютер.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bully.title: Рабби хулиганка
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bully.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была лидером небольшой банды в темных переулках Лунополиса. [PAWN_pronoun] очень не любила чужих на своей территории и отвечала на критику [PAWN_possessive] кулаками.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Adoptedchild.title: Рабби бастард
LanguageData.Rabbie_Adoptedchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была удочерена в семьей высокопоставленного офицера. [PAWN_possessive] мать имела доброе сердце несмотря на ее положение, и она ростила [PAWN_nameDef] вместе с остальными ее детьми. [PAWN_pronoun] получила формальное образование, соответствующее знати.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Academystudent.title: Рабби кадет военной академии
LanguageData.Rabbie_Academystudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] родилась в семье, которая служила в армии поколениями. [PAWN_pronoun] готовилась к поступлению в университет, но в итоге [PAWN_pronoun] отказалась от [PAWN_possessive] планов и записалась в военную академию по воле [PAWN_possessive] матери.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Daylaborer.title: Рабби ребенок рабочий
LanguageData.Rabbie_Daylaborer.baseDescription: Став бродягой будучи совсем маленькой, [PAWN_nameDef] потратила [PAWN_possessive] юность путешествую по [PAWN_possessive] родному лунополису выполняя черную работу для других.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Feeder.title: Рабби животнолюб
LanguageData.Rabbie_Feeder.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] интересовалась животноводством и проводила большую часть [PAWN_possessive] свободного время кормя домашних мышей и хорьков в [PAWN_possessive] школе на лунополисе. [PAWN_pronoun] заботилась о том, чтобы не забывать помыть спину черепахам в зооуголке.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Child.title: Рабби ребенок утопии
LanguageData.Rabbie_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] выросла с [PAWN_possessive] родителями в высококлассных апартаментах в лунограде утопии. [PAWN_pronoun] увлекалась рисованием пейзажей ее неоново-голубого города с балкона [PAWN_possessive] аппартаментов.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Topstudent.title: Рабби отличница
LanguageData.Rabbie_Topstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была многообещающей ученицей, родители которой провели большую часть [PAWN_possessive] детсва в командировках. И хотя [PAWN_possessive] оценки были впечатляющими, [PAWN_pronoun] провела детство очень будучи очень одинокой.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Studentunion.title: Рабби председатель студсовета
LanguageData.Rabbie_Studentunion.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была членом [PAWN_possessive] школьного студсовета, что дало ей [PAWN_possessive] значительную нагрузку во время [PAWN_possessive] обучения. Некоторые из этих задач включали в себя помощь учителям с оформлением документов, отлов провинившихся студентов и работу с казной студенческого совета..
LanguageData.Rabbie_Singer.title: Рабби школьный идол
LanguageData.Rabbie_Singer.baseDescription: В детсве [PAWN_nameDef] была известным школьным идолом на луне-рае, написав и исполнив несколько хитов. Обычно люди считали, что [PAWN_pronoun] продолжит [PAWN_possessive] свой успех во взрослой жизни.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Clerk.title: Рабби ребенок клерк
LanguageData.Rabbie_Clerk.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была ребенком, работавшим в офисах энергетической компании в лунополисе. Изначально взятая на стажировку, Лунные Войны вынудили компанию рассчитывать на нее как на рядового сотрудника.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bookworm.title: Рабби вундеркинд
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bookworm.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] оказалась поразительным ребенком с превосходным интелектом. Настолько высоким, что ее приняли в университет в невероятно юном возрасти. Впрочем, ее чрезмерный фокус на учебе привел к проблемам с социализацией и физическим развитием.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Rabbitholeslave.title: Рабби раб шахтер
LanguageData.Rabbie_Rabbitholeslave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была схвачена пиратами рабби в юном возрасте во время путешествия на корабле мигрантов. Ее продали в рабство на лунную колонию пограничного мира, где ее заставляли работать в шахте и добывать ресурсы.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poorchild.title: Рабби нищая
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poorchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] выросла в бедной семье в трущобах лунополиса. [PAWN_possessive] родители без конца дрались и ругались, и поэтому [PAWN_pronoun] выживала благодаря помощи [PAWN_possessive] друзей и прохожих.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gearhead.title: Рабби механик
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gearhead.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] с детсва интересовалась электроникой и техникой. [PAWN_pronoun] устроила маленькую мастерскую в коморке склада на лунополисе и чинила сломаные телевизоры и радио других рабби.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Nursestudent.title: Рабби помошница медсестры
LanguageData.Rabbie_Nursestudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была ученицей, которая заботилась о своих заболевших сокурсниках и помогала школьной медсестре. Проведя кучу времени в медкабинете, она подружилась со школьной медсестрой и стала лучше понимать медицину.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Subject.title: Рабби испытуемая
LanguageData.Rabbie_Subject.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была брошена после рождения в колонии, использовавшей сирот для военных экспериментов. Множество детей погибли в результате этих экспериментов, но она вытерпела и в итоге попала в армию. Впрочем, ей очень нехватало любви и тепла.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deliverygirl.title: Рабби Deliverygirl
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deliverygirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would spend the early morning before school working as a delivery girl for [PAWN_possessive] local grocer, saving up money to live on one of [PAWN_possessive] urbmoon's high-rise apartments. [PAWN_pronoun] would often be tired during the day.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pubwaitress.title: Рабби официантка
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pubwaitress.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была официанткой в местном баре ее лунополиса. Она отвечала за то, что бы разносить напитки из планетариума клиентам Рабби, скрутку табачных сигар и даже выучила несколько рецептов простых коктелей у бармена.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Builderassistant.title: Рабби плотник ученик
LanguageData.Rabbie_Builderassistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была учеником плотника в развивающейсвя лунной колонии. Большинство ее обязанностей были простыми задачами вроде укладки плитки, уборка и покраска. Такая работа обеспечила много практического опыта и достойную заработную плату
LanguageData.Rabbie_CricketMVP.title: Рабби капитан крикетист
LanguageData.Rabbie_CricketMVP.baseDescription: Крикет был одним из самых популярных видов спорта в империи рабби, и [PAWN_nameDef] была капитаном собственного крикетного клуба. Очень спортивная и популярная среди своих сверстников, она имела репутацию крайне высокомерного человека.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streamer.title: Рабби игровой стример
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streamer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была известена на ее лунотопии как стримерша видеоигр и киберспортсмен. Однако ее известность закончилась как только она прекратила стримить после того, как родные вынудили ее найти реальную работу.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Garrisonkid.title: Рабби дочь полка
LanguageData.Rabbie_Garrisonkid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] родилась на истерзанный войной луне и выросла в военном гарнизоне. Она мечтала служить в армии и вступила в нее при первой же возможности.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gunlover.title: Рабби фанатка оружия
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gunlover.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] любила механическую красоту огнестрельного оружия и считал его продвинутым оружием. Поэтому она завела собственную коллекцию огнестрела. Хоть она и хотела бы помочь военным, ей была противна жесткая подготовку и строгие правила, и вместо этого выражала свое разочарование на стрельбище.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Failedstudent.title: Рабби отчисленная
LanguageData.Rabbie_Failedstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была ленивой ученицей, которая тратила ночи напролет играя в видеоигры. В конечном итоге ее отчислили из школы и она проводила свое время с такими же исключенными как она.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Guitarist.title: Рабби гитарист
LanguageData.Rabbie_Guitarist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] не хватало мотивации для взросления, но под руководством заботливого учителя она начала играть на гитаре в своей школьной группе. После успеха на местном фестивале [PAWN_nameDef] нашела свое истинное призвание.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gamer.title: Рабби геймерша
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gamer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] каждый день играла в видеоигры. В основном она предпочитала играть в захватывающие игры, основанные на выживании и построении базы на пограничных мирах. Из-за своего хобби, она немного лучше разбирается в строительстве и отделке.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Littledoc.title: Рабби студент медик
LanguageData.Rabbie_Littledoc.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] родилась в семье врачей, даже ее бабушка и дедушка работали в сфере медицины. Она продолжил эту семейную традицию и начала изучать медицину из-за ожиданий своих родителей.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Drugdealer.title: Рабби наркокурьер
LanguageData.Rabbie_Drugdealer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] работала наркокурьером в преступной организации лунополиса. [PAWN_nameDef] котрабандой возила наркотики и нелегальный планетариум в школы и брала плату у клиентов. Это была прибыльная работа, но ей приходилось несколько раз общаться с местной полицией и другими преступными организациями.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronometrainee.title: Рабби компьютер стажер
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronometrainee.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] с раннего возраста готовили к тому что бы стать живым компьютером. Ее также постоянно накачивали большими дозами планетария для усиления пророческие и логические способностей в надежде, что она сможет стать секретарем в высших эшелонах Лунной империи.
LanguageData.Rabbie_StudentUnionclerk.title: Рабби секретарь студсовета
LanguageData.Rabbie_StudentUnionclerk.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] отвечала за ведение протокола на заседаниях студенческого совета. Не желая общаться вне этого круга, [PAWN_nameDef] провела большую часть своего свободного времени в тихих местах, сочиняя фантастические романы.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Researchassistant.title: Рабби научный сотрудник
LanguageData.Rabbie_Researchassistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] была зачислена в имперский медицинский институт в молодом возрасте в качестве полевого научного сотрудника. Испытывая трудности в общении с другими рабби, [PAWN_nameDef] была отправлен в человеческий мир-рай для исследования их культуры.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Alleylunatic.title: Рабби Lunatic
LanguageData.Rabbie_Alleylunatic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] жила на человеческом средневековом мире, блуждая между деревнями, чтобы найти выброшенную едой и одеждой. У нее очень мало денег, и [PAWN_nameDef] не смогла найти себе планетария. В конце концов, она опустилась до убийства людей, не зная, что у них в мозгу нет и капли планетариума. [PAWN_nameDef] всегда бродит со зловещей улыбкой.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Cornershopgirl.title: Рабби Cornershop Girl
LanguageData.Rabbie_Cornershopgirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] brother were orphans growing up, and got by on the streets by setting up an illegal kiosk on an urbmoon subway station. Selling candy, chocolates and tobacco; they barely made enough money to feed themselves, but the local police force would turn a blind eye to their antics.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PetshopKP.title: Рабби Petshop Owner
LanguageData.Rabbie_PetshopKP.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had inheirted the family pet shot after [PAWN_possessive] parents lost their lives in the Lunar War. [PAWN_nameDef] learnt how to care for domestic pets such as cats and dogs, exotic pets such as reptiles, and learnt basic customer sevice skills.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Noblesurvivor.title: Рабби Noble Outcast
LanguageData.Rabbie_Noblesurvivor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a high ranking military officer with a painted heritage. However, the family was scattered across the galaxy and hunted after they were attacked by a hostile rabbie faction. [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across several human worlds under a false identity, doing whatever it took to survive.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Planetrabbit.title: Рабби Human Child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Planetrabbit.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born outside the Rabbie Empire, seperated from [PAWN_possessive] parents. Living on a human urbworld, [PAWN_possessive] human family paid large sums of money to feed [PAWN_nameDef] the planetarium [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Flowershopgirl.title: Рабби Flowershop Girl
LanguageData.Rabbie_Flowershopgirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at a high end flowershop on a glittermoon. Most of [PAWN_possessive] work revolved around caring for flowers growing in hydroponic basins, keeping them in the optimal temperature and trimming the flowers.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Wealthychild.title: Рабби Rich Kid
LanguageData.Rabbie_Wealthychild.baseDescription: On Lunar Empire glittermoons, rich rabbies lived in high-rise complexes in cities underneath the mantle of said moons. [PAWN_nameDef] ate with golden cutlery, lived to [PAWN_possessive] parents expectations and had everything [PAWN_pronoun] ever wanted. However, [PAWN_pronoun] did not rest on [PAWN_possessive] laurels and was constantly improving her medical skills; [PAWN_possessive] only real interest in life.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Officerchild.title: Рабби Officer's Child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Officerchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a senior military office on an empire coremoon city. [PAWN_nameDef] was taught proper table ettiquette, as well as how to fight with both guns and swords, but never performed any hard labour.
LanguageData.Rabbie_ExcutiveEnergy.title: Рабби Energy Executive
LanguageData.Rabbie_ExcutiveEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the senior member of the Imperial Power Management Bureau of the Rabbie Empire. [PAWN_nameDef] led a research team into advancing energy production in the empire, and held sway with the bureau in making important policy decisions.
LanguageData.Rabbie_EngineerEnergy.title: Рабби Electrical Technician
LanguageData.Rabbie_EngineerEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an electrical technician for a coremoon city, servicing the cities' arcotech power generators. Most of [PAWN_possessive] responsibilities lied with industrial climate control, mass production food farms and other urban facilities.
LanguageData.Rabbie_ScientistEnergy.title: Рабби Electrical Scientist
LanguageData.Rabbie_ScientistEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a distinguished scientist who; after graduating from the Imperial Empire University joined the Power Management Bureau. [PAWN_nameDef] worked in state-of-the-art laboratories researching efficient energy production methods.
LanguageData.Rabbie_StaffEnergy.title: Рабби Electrical Clerk
LanguageData.Rabbie_StaffEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a clerk for the Power Management Bureau, but was more a paper-pusher than anything else. Due to the Lunar War, [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to soldiers protecting power facilities on a regular basis.
LanguageData.Rabbie_JStaffEnergy.title: Рабби Electrical Intern
LanguageData.Rabbie_JStaffEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became an intern at the Power Management Bureau after graduating university. Before ending up on the Rim, [PAWN_nameDef] was expecting a full-time position.
LanguageData.Rabbie_EmpressSecretary.title: Рабби Empress Consort
LanguageData.Rabbie_EmpressSecretary.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the beloved consort of the empress of the Rabbie Empire; and also acted a personal assistant. Ever the clever rabbie, [PAWN_nameDef] held enough sway over the empress to influence empire policy.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Starshipoverseer.title: Рабби Starship Overseer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Starshipoverseer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the overseer of a migratory starship. Responsible for caring for the starship's artifical intelligence, [PAWN_nameDef] would constantly be woken from cryosleep to resolve technical problems the AI could not handle itself. However, the starship AI went rogue, and after confronting the AI Core, [PAWN_nameDef] mind was left devestated by a psychic lance.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fleetadmiral.title: Рабби Fleet Admirmal
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fleetadmiral.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the admiral to one of the many starship fleets in the Rabbie Empire. While most admirals spent their whole lives in the comfort of their flagship, [PAWN_nameDef] believed it was important to spend time amongst other ships as well as planet-side.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronome.title: Рабби Living Computer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronome.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had completed the mnemonic training to become one of the best secretaries of the empire. The cost of hiring one such as [PAWN_nameDef] is so astronomical that only the highest of nobility, megacorps and the empress herself could afford to do so. The loyalty of these secretaries is famous, as they lack any sense of self.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Vcommander.title: Рабби Commander
LanguageData.Rabbie_Vcommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the decorated commander of a ground forces army who served in several wars against enemy civilizations. [PAWN_nameDef] developed a reputation for great tactical acumen before being stationed partoling the rim.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCveteran.title: Рабби Mercenary Veteran
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCveteran.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mercenary for a private military contractor. A veteran of countless battles, [PAWN_nameDef] had a sense for enemy tactics and led their allies to several victories, or at least minimzied losses in unwinnable contracts. [PAWN_nameDef] ability was compared to that to regular imperial commanders.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fighterpilot.title: Рабби Frigate Pilot
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fighterpilot.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a frigate pilot for the imperial military. During a skirmish gone wrong, the ship's navigation system went haywire; sending the frigate bouncing out of the conflict zone. The ship crash landed on an unknown rimworld, leaving [PAWN_nameDef] stranded.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fieldmedic.title: Рабби Field Medic
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fieldmedic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had seen a lot of death during the the Lunar War. It was [PAWN_possessive] responsibility to stabilize wounded soldiers, transport injured rabbies to safety and inspire hope on the battlefield. Over time, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a matyrdom complex, willing to sacrafice themselves to save others.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Survivorofficer.title: Рабби War Survivor
LanguageData.Rabbie_Survivorofficer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived a peaceful life as a young officer on a midmoon city with [PAWN_possessive] partner. However, as the Lunar War progressed, this midmoon became a front line for the war. [PAWN_nameDef] served on a frigate during the conflict, but their utter defeat forced [PAWN_nameDef] into an cryosleep escape pod; the fate of [PAWN_possessive] partner unknown.
LanguageData.Rabbie_tacticalcommander.title: Рабби War Hero
LanguageData.Rabbie_tacticalcommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a front-line infantryman with no desire for promotion, but had a close bond with [PAWN_possessive] comrades. When [PAWN_possessive] unit was cut off from the rest of the platoon, [PAWN_pronoun] took charge of the situation and brought [PAWN_possessive] squad back from behind enemy lines. For [PAWN_possessive] efforts, [PAWN_nameDef] had recieved a promotion to officer as well as medals and accolades.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Weaponarchitect.title: Рабби Military Engineer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Weaponarchitect.baseDescription: After graduating from the Imperial University, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the military as an engineer. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] team designed several top of the line weapons that still see use in the Imperial Military today.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Internist.title: Рабби Physician
LanguageData.Rabbie_Internist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well respected physician for an urbmoon private hospital. [PAWN_nameDef] was especially known for being a harsh mentor for nurses and medicine students, but also someone who genuinely cared for those around [PAWN_possessive] in spite of their attitude.
LanguageData.Rabbie_surgeon.title: Рабби Surgeon
LanguageData.Rabbie_surgeon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a surgeon for an urbworld public hospital. Typically on-call, [PAWN_possessive] sleep schedule was erratic as they were called on to perform emergency surgeries. Occassionally, [PAWN_nameDef] would find themselves assaulted by drunken rabbies that found themselves in the ER.
LanguageData.Rabbie_psychiatry.title: Рабби Psychiatrist
LanguageData.Rabbie_psychiatry.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had devoted their life to caring for mentally unstable rabbies. Due to the rabbie's genetic disposition towards insanity, [PAWN_possessive] work was extensive.
LanguageData.Rabbie_excavator.title: Рабби Miner
LanguageData.Rabbie_excavator.baseDescription: While most rabbies lack the physical capabilities to dig tunnels for a living; for some rabbie they feel an instinctual desire to dig. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such rabbie, who was a driller on a lunar hive colony. They felt an odd comfort when [PAWN_pronoun] was inside a dark cavern that [PAWN_pronoun] could not describe.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Moonfarmer.title: Рабби Moon Farmer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Moonfarmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and tended to a lunar dome farm, an artifical greenhouse for growing vegetables on desolate moons. Despite the hard work, [PAWN_nameDef] lived a comfortable life.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Schoolteacher.title: Рабби Teacher
LanguageData.Rabbie_Schoolteacher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a school teacher who was popular with [PAWN_possessive] students after getting intimate with several students. [PAWN_nameDef] career came to an end after having relations with several students during a school trip.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Businessgirl.title: Рабби Businesswoman
LanguageData.Rabbie_Businessgirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a businesswoman for a prolific rabbie megacorp dealing in the export of luxury goods across the galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef] would often have to negoatiate with the empire for the rights to trade with tribal and medieval planets. Always on the go, [PAWN_nameDef] took pleasure in eating the local food in places [PAWN_pronoun] visited; but never learnt how to cook.
LanguageData.Rabbie_chef.title: Рабби Celebrity Chef
LanguageData.Rabbie_chef.baseDescription: Vegetarian dishes made by [PAWN_nameDef] were so popular [PAWN_pronoun] attracted patrons from across the galaxy. It was [PAWN_nameDef] philosophy that [PAWN_possessive] food would bridge the gap between the myriad races of the galaxy. The secret to [PAWN_possessive] success was hydroponic gardens in the back of the restaurant.
LanguageData.Rabbie_NatlAgent.title: Рабби Secret Agent
LanguageData.Rabbie_NatlAgent.baseDescription: While [PAWN_nameDef] identity was a mystery to the public, [PAWN_pronoun] presence was clearly felt in rabbie society. Acting in the shadows, [PAWN_pronoun] would bring down terrorist groups, criminal organizations and enemy spies within the empire. [PAWN_nameDef] would often take on the persona of a simple tailor to blend into society.
LanguageData.Rabbie_neet.title: Рабби NEET
LanguageData.Rabbie_neet.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] could not land a job due to [PAWN_possessive] abrasive personality and lack of work skills, so [PAWN_pronoun] wasted away [PAWN_possessive] days in [PAWN_possessive] room. Seeing other rabbies outisde [PAWN_possessive] window headed to work put [PAWN_nameDef] on edge, but [PAWN_pronoun] would always put off looking for work.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Concreteworker.title: Рабби Construction Worker
LanguageData.Rabbie_Concreteworker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker that helped build several high-rise complexes for an urbmoon city. After the tools were set down for day, [PAWN_pronoun] would sit on the scaffolds in secret with [PAWN_possessive] coworkers, enjoying planetarium tea and sweets with the neon view of the city below.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Trafficpolice.title: Рабби Traffic Cop
LanguageData.Rabbie_Trafficpolice.baseDescription: While it was [PAWN_nameDef] responsibility to control traffic at intersections, [PAWN_possessive] job was a role that had not seen use in over a hundred years. Due to the automated systems ran by the cities artifical intelligence, the position of traffic cop was purely a symbolic gesture more than anything else. In reality, the most work [PAWN_nameDef] ever had to do was direct bicycle traffic in rural areas.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bartender.title: Рабби Bartender
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bartender.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], dressed in formal attire and a neat bowtie; worked as a bartender for a cocktail bar in a glittermoon city. Typically, patrons would consult [PAWN_nameDef] about their troubles, so [PAWN_pronoun] would lend a sympathetic ear. For [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_possessive] motto was "It's time to mix drinks and change lives!"
LanguageData.Rabbie_Serialkiller.title: Рабби Serial Killer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Serialkiller.baseDescription: After an accident involving a vibro-dagger that took the life on an innocent rabbie, [PAWN_nameDef] became enamoured with the thrill of taking another life. As time went on, nervousness turned to relief, then to emptiness; the only feeling [PAWN_nameDef] had left was the desire to kill.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stockfarmer.title: Рабби Cattle Farmer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stockfarmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a cattle ramp on a midmoon, supplying the large cities with high-quality meat, leather and milk. Despite the simplicity of the work, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive]self very wealthy.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Castaway.title: Рабби Castaway
LanguageData.Rabbie_Castaway.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few survivors of a migratory ship that was blown up in an unexplained accident. Sent adrift across space in a cryosleep casket, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually crashlanded on a distant rimworld, and began to wander the desolate landscape.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maid.title: Рабби Maid
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a housemaid for one of the empire's noble families. Responsibilities included cleaning, laundry and preperation of afternoon tea. Occassionally the ruling lady would have picnics in the garden, which served as an opportunity for [PAWN_nameDef] to train young maids-to-be.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MMechanic.title: Рабби City Atmosphere Tech
LanguageData.Rabbie_MMechanic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many atmosphere technicians responsible for climate, water and temperature facilities for [PAWN_possessive] urbworld city. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] had accidentally caused the death of one of [PAWN_possessive] coworkers due to a safety violation, and was terminated from their employment. [PAWN_nameDef] still has nightmares of that day.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Companyemployee.title: Рабби Corp Employee
LanguageData.Rabbie_Companyemployee.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a small urbmoon city, earning a steady salary working for a local megacorp. [PAWN_nameDef] life was without strife, and [PAWN_pronoun] would enjoy going out on the weekends eating traditional carrot dishes.
LanguageData.Rabbie_BarDancer.title: Рабби Exotic Dancer
LanguageData.Rabbie_BarDancer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a sex worker at a grimey urbmoon strip club. Rabbie dancers attracted a lot of attention from visiting spacers and [PAWN_nameDef] was never short on cash, but it could not fill the void in [PAWN_possessive] heart.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Prostitute.title: Рабби Escort
LanguageData.Rabbie_Prostitute.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an escort worker for a variety of clients. Often, [PAWN_possessive] work involved rich clients consuming excessive amounts of planetarium to produce euphoric effects during intercourse. The work was distastful, but paid well.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Staridol.title: Рабби Space Idol
LanguageData.Rabbie_Staridol.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a galatic idol known across the galaxy for [PAWN_possessive] elegant voice, graceful dancing and beautiful appearance. As a rabbie, [PAWN_pronoun] was very popular with certain human cultures.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Housewife.title: Рабби Housewife
LanguageData.Rabbie_Housewife.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a housewife on a human midworld. Living in a small suburban house, [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for cooking, cleaning and laundry in the household. Every evening [PAWN_pronoun] would have tea ready for [PAWN_possessive] spouses return.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streetcleaner.title: Рабби Trashwoman
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streetcleaner.baseDescription: Even the most glamourous glittermoons in the empire need people to take out the trash. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of those rabbie. Due to a head injury, it was the only line of work [PAWN_pronoun] could perform, but [PAWN_pronoun] was happy regardless.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poor.title: Рабби Hobo
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poor.baseDescription: Beneath the neon-blue skyscrapers, the empire urbmoons houses a number of homeless rabbies in the slums beneath. [PAWN_nameDef] endured such poverty, but one day decided to strike it out in space in search of their fortune.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCmiddle.title: Рабби Mercenary
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCmiddle.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a private military company, and fought in various skirmishes against many different space-faring races. The death of [PAWN_possessive] comrades continued to weigh heavily on [PAWN_possessive] mind, but her combat skills are sharp.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCrookie.title: Рабби Mercenary Rookie
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCrookie.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted with a private military company in spite of the negative conotations, as it paid far better than signing on with the imperial military. [PAWN_nameDef] didn't make it very far, but only cared about the money.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Controller.title: Рабби Spaceport Controller
LanguageData.Rabbie_Controller.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a spaceport traffic controller for a midmoon station. Living conditions on the station were cramped and poor, and the consequences for slacking on the job were astronomical, so [PAWN_nameDef] was constantly on edge.
LanguageData.Rabbie_pharmacist.title: Рабби Pharmacist
LanguageData.Rabbie_pharmacist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a small pharmacy in the middle of an urbmoon city. Supplies were difficult to come by in the middle of the city, especially planetarium. Because of these difficulties, [PAWN_nameDef] struggled to turn a profit.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dispatchedcook.title: Рабби Space Chef
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dispatchedcook.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a chef on an imperial cruiseship. Having visited various glittermoons, military moon colonies and human coreworlds; [PAWN_nameDef] worked with exotic ingredients and developed various unique dishes.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Enurse.title: Рабби ER Nurse
LanguageData.Rabbie_Enurse.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nurse working the emergency room of an urbmoon public hospital. Due to the urgent nature of the work required, [PAWN_nameDef] became a rabbie that prized efficiency.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Factoryworker.title: Рабби Factory Worker
LanguageData.Rabbie_Factoryworker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a hivemoon factory assembly line. Rabbies working the assembly line were not told what their efforts were going towards, and all [PAWN_nameDef] did was a small part of the process over and over again.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Carpenter.title: Рабби Carpenter
LanguageData.Rabbie_Carpenter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a carpenter for a small settlement on a midworld moon. Rather than large construction projects, [PAWN_nameDef] worked on small projects like family homes, cafes and shop interiors. [PAWN_nameDef] was a pillar of [PAWN_possessive] community.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Steve.title: Рабби Megacorp CEO
LanguageData.Rabbie_Steve.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] founded a megacorp called "Berry Incorperated," a technology company famous for developing the most commonly used commlinks in the Imperial Empire. While practically a celebrity in [PAWN_possessive] own right, [PAWN_possessive] company produced its products in inhumane hiveworld factories. While the commonly held belief is that [PAWN_nameDef] passed away, [PAWN_pronoun] has actually found [PAWN_possessive] way onto a rimworld through bizarre circumstances.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Ustudent.title: Рабби University Student
LanguageData.Rabbie_Ustudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] attended one of the Imperial Empire's prestigious universities, home to the empire's most aspiring and gifted minds. Such scholars hold the same level of respect as imperial soldiers, the cultural belief is that those who seek higher education will become the future pillars of the empire.
LanguageData.Rabbie_UUstudent.title: Рабби University Dropout
LanguageData.Rabbie_UUstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_pronoun] was pushed into attending university at the request of [PAWN_possessive] mother. Without any desire to study, [PAWN_pronoun] was miserable throughout their study. After struggling for years, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually dropped out.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mafia.title: Рабби Mafia Grunt
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mafia.baseDescription: On the surface, [PAWN_nameDef] was the manager of a human inspired restaurant that focused on pasta dishes. However, the business was merely a front for money-laundering and other such illegal activities. [PAWN_nameDef] was actually a member of a moderately large crime organization.
LanguageData.Rabbie_geologist.title: Рабби Geologist
LanguageData.Rabbie_geologist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a geologist for one of the empires migration ships. While surveying the atmosphere and mineral composition of the soil was important, a source of planetarium was the highest concern.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Minedigger.title: Рабби Frontier Miner
LanguageData.Rabbie_Minedigger.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had purchased mining rights from the empire to set up mining operations in the mountains of a distant rimworld. While [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] team were expecting to strike gold, the venture turned up nothing of value. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed behind when the rest of the team left the planet, scraping away at the tunnel walls in the dark.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stardebrisharvester.title: Рабби Asteroid Miner
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stardebrisharvester.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] purchased a small mining vessel and set out into the depths of space to mine valuable resources from asteroids. During one such expedition, a small asteroid slipped past the sensors and rendered the ship nothing more than scrap metal. [PAWN_nameDef] was left adrift until they were captured by pirates.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Designer.title: Рабби Fashion Designer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Designer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for an independent fashion company on the outskirts of a midmoon city. Tasked with designing trendy fashion products, [PAWN_pronoun] tried her hardest to make a big break in the industry, but never made any big waves.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Escapedslave.title: Рабби Escaped Slave
LanguageData.Rabbie_Escapedslave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had been captured by human pirates and taken to a pirate rimworld colony to perform hard labour and tend to the desires of her masters. At the height of [PAWN_possessive] desperation, [PAWN_pronoun] stabbed one of her masters and fled the colony, seeking a way back to the Imperial Empire.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deserter.title: Рабби Military Deserter
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deserter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted with the miltary out of pride for [PAWN_possessive] nation and family, but did not have the heart to take the life of another. Even holding a gun in [PAWN_possessive] hands caused [PAWN_nameDef] to tremble in fear. Eventually, [PAWN_nameDef] defected from the military and hid away on a distant rimworld.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MBoss.title: Рабби Mafia Boss
LanguageData.Rabbie_MBoss.baseDescription: In the past, [PAWN_nameDef] was the boss of one of the largest rabbie criminal organizations in the galaxy. The gang had a hand in most of the empire's local police forces and politicians, and controlled several moons on the outer edge of the empire. Eventually, the Imperial Army was brought to bare on the organization, and [PAWN_nameDef] was arrested. In the end, [PAWN_nameDef] was released thanks to ceaseless bribes, lobbying and political connections.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maddoc.title: Рабби Mad Doctor
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maddoc.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a glittermoon plastic surgeon with a perverse sense of beauty. While harmless enough for a time, eventually [PAWN_nameDef] was brought before the courts after mutilating a client to create what [PAWN_pronoun] called "True Beauty". While not found guility of any crime, [PAWN_possessive] medical license was revoked and [PAWN_pronoun] found her way to the backwaters of the empire.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mechchaser.title: Рабби Mechanoid Slayer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mechchaser.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] family to a mechanoid raid years ago, and has vowed vengence on all mechanoids. Leading a band of privateers across the galaxy, [PAWN_nameDef] has raided several mechanoid production facilities. [PAWN_nameDef]'s efforts have recieved covert backing from the Imperial Army.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bountyhunter.title: Рабби Bounty Hunter
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bountyhunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a self-employed bounty hunter operating in the galactic rim. Harboring a vendetta against humans, [PAWN_nameDef] would often take the chance to execute wanted humans even if the bounty would pay more for the target to be brought in alive.
LanguageData.Rabbie_BackwardDoc.title: Рабби Medieval Doctor
LanguageData.Rabbie_BackwardDoc.baseDescription: Having taken residence on a human medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the realm as the "Rabbit-Eared Herbswoman". While very effective, one day the local lord arrested [PAWN_nameDef] after one of her patients stole some of her planetarium tea, and accused [PAWN_possessive] of being a witch after experiencing prophetic hallucenations. [PAWN_nameDef] escaped the dungeons and returned to their spaceship to flee the planet in tears.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Penitentwanderer.title: Рабби Repentful Wanderer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Penitentwanderer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier in the Imperial Army who settled with a tribal village on a distant rimworld to escape the war. [PAWN_nameDef] desired to return to nature, but the lack of planetarium eventually drove [PAWN_possessive] insane. After killing everyone in the village, [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the rim in grief and melancholy.
LanguageData.Rabbie_retiredcommander.title: Рабби Retired Commander
LanguageData.Rabbie_retiredcommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a retired commander in the Imperial Army, who had settled on a midmoon orbiting a human midworld. While the empire and the human confederation were at peace for many generations, relations broke down and war broke out between the midworld and its moon. Returning to the empire, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] forces fought fiercly but were eventually conqured by the human forces.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Emuhunter.title: Рабби Emu Hunter
LanguageData.Rabbie_Emuhunter.baseDescription: On a distant rimworld, human experimentation on the ecosystem resulted in the habitable zone of the planet was infested with emu. [PAWN_nameDef] was hired by the human biocorp to exterminate the emu, but it seemed that the creatures were immune to machine gun fire, and the conflict felt endless.
LanguageData.Rabbie_TGuardian.title: Рабби Town Guardian
LanguageData.Rabbie_TGuardian.baseDescription: Living with [PAWN_possessive] husband and children, [PAWN_nameDef] resided on a human midworld just on the border of the galactic rim. [PAWN_nameDef] led a small militia to defend the town from pirate raids, but eventually the pirates bombarded the planet from orbit with nuclear warheads. After nuclear winter set in, [PAWN_nameDef] tried to flee with [PAWN_possessive] family but their ship was destroyed and their cryosleep caskets sent adrift in space.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MoonSailor.title: Рабби Starship Navigator
LanguageData.Rabbie_MoonSailor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the navigator of a rabbie migration starship. The ship was assaulted by pirates on a regular basis, and [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] crew made great progress on their journey, but eventually the ship was taken and the inhabitants sent spiraling into space. [PAWN_nameDef] ended up crashing on a savage rimworld.
LanguageData.Rabbie_DesertRegiment.title: Рабби Desert Soldier
LanguageData.Rabbie_DesertRegiment.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier in the Imperial Army who fought on desert worlds. Operations on desert worlds typically focused on stealth and long range engagements, and those in [PAWN_nameDef] squad were experts in that field.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MountainRegiment.title: Рабби Military Ranger
LanguageData.Rabbie_MountainRegiment.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier in the Imperial Army's Ranger Division; infantrymen who excelled in combat in rough terrain such as mountains and forests. Guerilla warfare was common practice in [PAWN_possessive] line of work, and [PAWN_nameDef]'s squad would often win engagements without the enemy having the chance to retaliate.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Snowrabbit.title: Рабби Iceworld Soldier
LanguageData.Rabbie_Snowrabbit.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was from the Imperial Army's "Snow Rabbit" Infantry Regiment, infantrymen who fought on iceworld planets. The conditions were brutal, and engaging enemy facilities proved especially challenging on an iceworld; but the Snow Rabbits had strong spirits and were surprisingly adaptable.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Spacemarine.title: Рабби Space Marine
LanguageData.Rabbie_Spacemarine.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the of the Imperial Army "Moon Rabbit" Regiment, space marines who specialized in fighting in zero atmosphere and zero gravity environments. Essential in the defense of moon colonies from human invaders, the Moon Rabbits are revered as the empire's eternal guardians. While a decorated soldier, [PAWN_nameDef]'s true desire was to settle down and raise a family.
